criteria: Active Participation in School-Based Fitness/Health Activities
Active Participation in Community-Based Fitness/Health Activities
Demonstrates Knowledge of Health and Fitness Principles in Activities
descriptions: Student does not participate in any school-based activities promoting fitness and health.
Student participates in one school-based activity with minimal engagement.
Student participates in one school-based activity with moderate engagement.
Student participates in two or more school-based activities with moderate engagement.
Student actively participates in two or more school-based activities, demonstrating enthusiasm and contributing positively.
Student takes a leadership role in organizing or promoting school-based fitness/health activities, demonstrating a strong commitment to wellness.
Student does not participate in any community-based activities promoting fitness and health.
Student participates in one community-based activity with minimal engagement.
Student participates in one community-based activity with moderate engagement.
Student participates in two or more community-based activities with moderate engagement.
Student actively participates in two or more community-based activities, demonstrating enthusiasm and contributing positively.
Student takes a leadership role in organizing or promoting community-based fitness/health activities, demonstrating a strong commitment to wellness.
Student shows no understanding of basic health and fitness principles in their participation.
Student demonstrates a limited understanding of health and fitness principles, sometimes applying them incorrectly.
Student demonstrates a basic understanding of health and fitness principles and attempts to apply them.
Student demonstrates a solid understanding of health and fitness principles and applies them correctly in most situations.
Student demonstrates a comprehensive understanding of health and fitness principles and consistently applies them correctly and effectively.
Student demonstrates expert understanding of health and fitness principles, applying them effectively and educating others on their importance.
